artists.biography: He was born on August 16, 1999 in Antalya. He was interested in music from an early age. Kadirhan Simav, who started playing music with guitar at first, later discovered that he could sing and is currently actively performing the vocal duties of the band. Yildirim Beyazit Uni.Computer Engineering continues to be trained.
artists.name: Kadirhan Simav
